body.para: Log: Changes for the alpha-0-1 release.

Modified: trunk/source/uber/web/index.html Url: https://salutafugijms.dev.java.net/source/browse/salutafugijms/trunk/source/uber/web/index.html?view=diff&rev=4&p1=trunk/source/uber/web/index.html&p2=trunk/source/uber/web/index.html&r1=3&r2=4 ============================================================================== --- trunk/source/uber/web/index.html (original) +++ trunk/source/uber/web/index.html 2007-06-22 02:05:32+0000 @@ -21,7 +21,7 @@

To use SalutafugiJMS in your application, see the package javadoc.

-SalutafugiJMS is currently in alpha release. Download the latest stabile code or browse the javadoc. There is also a change log and a todo list. +SalutafugiJMS is currently in alpha release. Download the latest stabile jars or javadoc, or browse the javadoc on line. There is also a change log and a todo list.

This initial series of releases of SalutafugiJMS just supports JMS Topics with weak autoacknowledge. (Peer-to-peer queues and stronger acknowledge both need an extra handshake.) Please let me know what features you need earliest. If you find a bug, please tell me. If you're feeling ambitious, send me a patch with some test code. The methods that aren't implemented yet will throw an UnsupportedOperationException as soon as you call them.

Modified: trunk/source/uber/web/todo.html Url: https://salutafugijms.dev.java.net/source/browse/salutafugijms/trunk/source/uber/web/todo.html?view=diff&rev=4&p1=trunk/source/uber/web/todo.html&p2=trunk/source/uber/web/todo.html&r1=3&r2=4 ============================================================================== --- trunk/source/uber/web/todo.html (original) +++ trunk/source/uber/web/todo.html 2007-06-22 02:05:32+0000 @@ -18,7 +18,7 @@

-salutafugijms +salutafugijms
